cz.tzima.partialsshot.publishing

Interface ContentPublisher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DropboxContentPublisher, LocalContentPublisher, TestingPublisher

    public interface ContentPublisher
    Implementations of ContentPublisher are supposed to publish created screenshots to any place (HDD, Dropbox, image sharing services etc).
    Author:
    Tomas Zima

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getTargetURL()
      Link to the screenshot.
      PublisherType getType() 
      boolean isLinkable()
      Checks if the (published) screenshot is linkable.
      void publish(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Publish the screenshot.
      void publish(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, java.lang.String name)
      Publish the screenshot with the specified name.

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        void publish(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
             java.lang.String name)
      throws ContentPublishingException
        Publish the screenshot with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        image - Screenshot.
        name - Name (e.g. filename, title, ...)
        Throws:
        ContentPublishingException - Screenshot couldn't be published.

      • publish

        void publish(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      throws ContentPublishingException
        Publish the screenshot.
        Parameters:
        image - Screenshot.
        Throws:
        ContentPublishingException - Screenshot couldn't be published.

      • getTargetURL

        java.lang.String getTargetURL()
        Link to the screenshot. If isLinkable() returns false then this method should return null.
        Returns:
        Link to the screenshot or null if link is not available.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Any screenshot wasn't published and there isn't link to generate.

      • isLinkable

        boolean isLinkable()
        Checks if the (published) screenshot is linkable.
        Returns:
        True if a direct link to the screenshot can be generated.

      • getType

        PublisherType getType()
        Returns:
        Type of the publisher (from PublisherType).
